getContent().Description: Returns the ad content string. This can be an HTML or JSON string, or any server template which contains assets for the ad.

getBaseUrl().Description: Returns the base URL as a String value. The base URL can be used to get an absolute path when the ad content assets use relative links.

Parameters: The rendered view of the ad.
onAdRendered(android.view.View).Description: Notifies the SDK that ad has finished rendering.

recordClick().Description: Records the click of the ad.

recordImpression().Description: Records the impression of the ad.

ClassDesc: Interface that contains information about custom rendered ads.
